items.title: Why AT&T’s CFO is hoping Congress will extend Trump’s corporate tax cuts
items.description: The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act factors into how companies are determining future planning.

items.title: Wall Street worried that new tariffs will turn the Trump bump into a slump—analysts warn the bulk of action is yet to come
items.description: Even unfilled tariff threats are beginning to alter consumer and business behavior, with markets stumbling on news of yet more sanctions on China.

items.title: GSK could double CEO Emma Walmsley’s pay to $27 million in bid to bring U.K. exec salaries in line with the U.S.
items.description: The British pharma giant said Emma Walmsley's current pay could put off candidates for her eventual successor.

items.title: Prada heiress who took the fashion label to new highs with Miu Miu, is eyeing Versace—but she won’t be the only one
items.description: “Versace is on everyone’s table,” said Miuccia Prada, the owner of the eponymous brand founded by her grandfather.

items.title: Nvidia says America’s trade war with China is hurting revenue, warning Trump’s tariffs have added a big ‘unknown’ to its future outlook
items.description: CEO Jensen Huang said Nvidia sales in China are half of what they were before export controls.
